decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to utilize aggressive creatures and powerful spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage as efficiently as possible. The deck features a mix of large creatures, evasive threats, and versatile disruption spells to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game. The inclusion of the companion card Obosh, the Preypiercer adds a unique twist to the deck's strategy, enhancing the damage output of odd-costed creatures and further amplifying its aggressive game plan.

The main focus of this deck is to consistently put pressure on the opponent with a mix of powerful creatures like Goldspan Dragon and Lovestruck Beast, supported by efficient spells like Bonecrusher Giant and Brazen Borrower. The addition of Obosh, the Preypiercer as a companion adds an extra layer of aggression by doubling the damage output of odd-costed creatures. By curving out with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells like Mystical Dispute, the Temur Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

This deck focuses on quickly cycling through cards to build a strong board presence and deal damage over multiple turns. By utilizing cards like Flourishing Fox and Zenith Flare, the deck aims to aggressively cycle through its library and overwhelm the opponent with a combination of creatures and direct damage spells. The key strategy is to play efficiently and maintain a high tempo throughout the game, utilizing the cycling mechanic to consistently draw into threats and answers while putting pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly summoning a wide array of cheap, efficient creatures to overwhelm the opponent. It includes cards that provide protection, evasion, and disruption to maintain board control. The goal is to build a strong board presence early on and maintain pressure with aggressive, low-cost creatures. The inclusion of Lurrus of the Dream-Den as a Companion adds an extra layer of versatility and resilience to the strategy. Overall, the deck is designed to maximize efficiency and aggression to win through sheer numbers and speed.

This deck focuses on utilizing cycling cards to quickly build a board presence and deal direct damage to the opponent. By cycling through cards like Flourishing Fox and Drannith Stinger, the player can trigger abilities like Valiant Rescuer and Zenith Flare, overwhelming the opponent with a flurry of creatures and burn spells. Additionally, Improbable Alliance provides a continuous stream of flying tokens, while Frostveil Ambush and Go for Blood help protect the board and push through damage. The deck's mana base includes dual lands to ensure consistent access to the necessary colors for its spells.

The deck focuses on using a variety of removal spells, ramping up mana, and controlling the board with creatures like Callous Bloodmage and Valki, God of Lies. It aims to take advantage of Emergent Ultimatum to search for powerful spells and Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider for added pressure. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value through blinking permanents. The deck seeks to outvalue opponents with a combination of powerful creatures, removal, and card advantage to secure victory through incremental advantages and overwhelming board presence.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and board wipes to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also focuses on ramping mana with cards like Cultivate and Wolfwillow Haven to enable the casting of big threats like Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider and Elder Gargaroth. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value by blinking cards and generating card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through powerful threats and strategic plays.

The deck focuses on quickly deploying small creatures while disrupting the opponent's plans with cards like Elite Spellbinder and Skyclave Apparition. By leveraging the aggressive potential of cards like Luminarch Aspirant and Seasoned Hallowblade while having protection from Alseid of Life's Bounty and Selfless Savior, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early and maintain pressure throughout the game. The inclusion of Maul of the Skyclaves provides a powerful equipment option to further boost the deck's offensive capabilities.

This deck focuses on aggressive play and maintaining pressure on the opponent. It includes powerful creatures like Questing Beast and Bonecrusher Giant, along with cards like Embercleave to quickly deal damage. The addition of The Akroan War provides control against opposing threats. The mana base is carefully balanced to ensure consistent performance. By utilizing a combination of efficient creatures and powerful combat tricks, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through relentless attacks.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively deal damage to the opponent as quickly as possible using a combination of low-cost creatures and powerful burn spells. By utilizing cards like Torbran, Fervent Champion, and Embercleave, along with Snow-Covered Mountains for extra damage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and win the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck also includes some control elements like Frost Bite and Faceless Haven to disrupt the opponent's strategy and maintain board presence.

The deck focuses on utilizing a wide range of control spells and removal to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also generating card advantage through various powerful draw spells like Omen of the Sea and Mazemind Tome. The deck aims to stall the game out with powerful threats like Elder Gargaroth and Koma, Cosmos Serpent, eventually overwhelming the opponent with card advantage and high-impact creatures. The deck also utilizes Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to provide additional value and flexibility in longer games.

This deck focuses on utilizing the power of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion to maximize value through blinking permanents. The deck aims to control the board using removal spells and counterspells while ramping up with cards like Cultivate. The goal is to generate card advantage and eventually overwhelm the opponent with powerful threats such as Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider and Emergent Ultimatum. The deck also includes a variety of modal lands to ensure smooth mana fixing throughout the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the board through a combination of removal spells and counter magic, while also ramping up its mana to cast powerful late-game threats. The inclusion of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion allows for additional value by blinking permanents for extra triggers. The deck also utilizes Emergent Ultimatum to tutor for powerful spells like Kiora Bests the Sea God or Elder Gargaroth, giving the deck a strong late-game advantage. Overall, the key strategy is to control the game until overwhelming opponents with powerful threats and value spells.

This deck focuses on establishing control of the game by using a combination of removal spells, counter spells, and threats. It aims to outvalue the opponent by generating card advantage through cards like Emergent Ultimatum and Yorion, Sky Nomad. The deck also has access to a variety of powerful threats like Vorinclex, Monstrous Raider and Kiora Bests the Sea God to close out the game once control has been established. The mana base is built to support the deck's three-color identity and ensure consistent access to all the necessary colors of mana.

The deck focuses on quickly playing low-cost white creatures to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive strategy. It includes cards that provide protection for your creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan, while also including cards that buff and support your attacking creatures. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures with powerful abilities and equipment to boost their effectiveness in combat. Snow-covered Plains are used to enable certain synergies within the deck. Overall, the deck aims to establish early board presence and maintain pressure on the opponent.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly flood the board with low-cost creatures, utilize Winota's ability to cheat out high-impact creatures from the deck, and apply pressure to the opponent with aggressive attacks. Key cards such as Skyclave Apparition and Blade Historian can generate value and close out games efficiently. The inclusion of disruption and protection spells like Selfless Savior and Seasoned Hallowblade helps to maintain board presence and protect key cards. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent early on and maintain a strong board presence to secure victory.
